channel.title: Container on Blanket
channel.description: Recent content in Container on Blanket

item.title: Implementation of runc as of November 2024
item.description: runc is a container runtime with a command-line interface tool. Although runc was separated from Docker in 2015, Docker still uses runc because the Docker Engine is built on top of containerd, which incorporates runc. In this post, I will explain some Linux features used in the implementation of runc.
